description: This course provides a comprehensive research opportunity, including an introduction to relevant background material, technical instruction, identification of a meaningful project, and data collection. The topic is determined by the faculty member in charge of the course and may relate to their research interests. Offered based on department decision. May be offered as a 1.00 credit course or .50 credit course. Prerequisite: determined by individual instructor.
name: Research:
notes: Prerequisite: PHYS 130 OR PHYS 131 OR PHYS 232.
title: Directed Undergraduate Research
